feature: Update HTTP Links to HTTPS for Security
description: Convert all external HTTP links to HTTPS and add proper security attributes to prevent mixed content warnings and improve security posture

phases.name: Update HTTP Links in Main Bio Section
phases.description: Convert HTTP links to HTTPS in the main biography paragraph (lines 576-580)

subtasks.title: Update UPR-Mayaguez link
subtasks.description: Convert http://uprm.edu/ to https://uprm.edu/ on line 576
subtasks.technical_details: Simple protocol change for university website link
acceptance_criteria: Link is accessible and works correctly
subtasks.notes: Successfully updated http://uprm.edu/ to https://uprm.edu/ on line 576 of index.html. The link now uses secure HTTPS protocol.

subtasks.title: Update Amazon Disaster Relief link
subtasks.description: Convert http://amazon.com/disasterrelief to https://amazon.com/disasterrelief on line 576
subtasks.technical_details: Simple protocol change for Amazon Disaster Relief page link
acceptance_criteria: Link is accessible and works correctly
subtasks.notes: Successfully converted http://amazon.com/disasterrelief to https://amazon.com/disasterrelief on line 576 of index.html

subtasks.title: Update LinkedIn link and text in bio
subtasks.description: Convert http://linkedin.com/in/abediaz to https://linkedin.com/in/abediaz (both href and display text) on line 578
subtasks.technical_details: Update both the href attribute and the visible link text to use HTTPS
acceptance_criteria: Link is accessible and works correctly
subtasks.notes: Successfully converted http://linkedin.com/in/abediaz to https://linkedin.com/in/abediaz on line 578 of index.html. Both the href attribute and display text now use secure HTTPS protocol.

subtasks.title: Update Instagram link and text in bio
subtasks.description: Convert http://instagram.com/abe238 to https://instagram.com/abe238 (both href and display text) on line 578
subtasks.technical_details: Update both the href attribute and the visible link text to use HTTPS
acceptance_criteria: Link is accessible and works correctly
subtasks.notes: Successfully converted http://instagram.com/abe238 to https://instagram.com/abe238 on line 578 of index.html. Both the href attribute and display text now use secure HTTPS protocol.

subtasks.title: Update Twitter link and text in bio
subtasks.description: Convert http://twitter.com/abe238 to https://twitter.com/abe238 (both href and display text) on line 578
subtasks.technical_details: Update both the href attribute and the visible link text to use HTTPS
acceptance_criteria: Link is accessible and works correctly
subtasks.notes: Successfully converted http://twitter.com/abe238 to https://twitter.com/abe238 on line 578 of index.html. Both the href attribute and display text now use secure HTTPS protocol.

subtasks.title: Update Contrast Showers link
subtasks.description: Convert http://contrastshowers.com/ to https://contrastshowers.com/ on line 580
subtasks.technical_details: Simple protocol change for external website link
acceptance_criteria: Link is accessible and works correctly
subtasks.notes: Successfully converted http://contrastshowers.com/ to https://contrastshowers.com/ on line 580 of index.html. The link now uses secure HTTPS protocol.

phases.name: Update HTTP Links in Footer Section
phases.description: Convert HTTP links to HTTPS in the contact/footer section (lines 596-597)

subtasks.title: Update LinkedIn link in footer
subtasks.description: Convert http://linkedin.com/in/abediaz to https://linkedin.com/in/abediaz on line 596
subtasks.technical_details: Simple protocol change for footer LinkedIn link
acceptance_criteria: Link is accessible and works correctly
subtasks.notes: Successfully converted http://linkedin.com/in/abediaz to https://linkedin.com/in/abediaz on line 596 of index.html in the footer section. The href attribute now uses secure HTTPS protocol.

subtasks.title: Update Twitter link in footer
subtasks.description: Convert http://twitter.com/abe238 to https://twitter.com/abe238 on line 597
subtasks.technical_details: Simple protocol change for footer Twitter link
acceptance_criteria: Link is accessible and works correctly
subtasks.notes: Successfully converted http://twitter.com/abe238 to https://twitter.com/abe238 on line 597 of index.html. The href attribute now uses secure HTTPS protocol, making it consistent with the LinkedIn link on line 596.

phases.name: Add Security Attributes to External Links
phases.description: Add rel='noopener noreferrer' and target='_blank' to all external links for improved security

subtasks.title: Add security attributes to bio external links
subtasks.description: Add target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer' to all external links on lines 576-580
subtasks.technical_details: Add security attributes to prevent tabnabbing attacks and improve user experience by opening external links in new tabs
acceptance_criteria: All external links have rel='noopener noreferrer'
subtasks.notes: Successfully added target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer' to all 11 external links on lines 576-580 of index.html. All external links now have proper security attributes to prevent tabnabbing attacks and will open in new tabs.

subtasks.title: Add security attributes to footer external links
subtasks.description: Add target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer' to footer links on lines 596-597
subtasks.technical_details: Add security attributes to footer LinkedIn and Twitter links
subtasks.notes: Successfully added target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer' to both footer links (LinkedIn and Twitter) on lines 596-597 of index.html. All footer external links now have proper security attributes to prevent tabnabbing attacks and will open in new tabs.

phases.name: Verification and Testing
phases.description: Verify all links work correctly and no HTTP links remain

subtasks.title: Verify no HTTP links remain
subtasks.description: Run grep/search to confirm no http:// links remain in the codebase (excluding metadata files)
subtasks.technical_details: Use grep to search for 'http://' in index.html and confirm 0 matches
acceptance_criteria: No http:// links found in index.html
subtasks.notes: Verification complete: No http:// links found in index.html. All HTTP links have been successfully converted to HTTPS. Only metadata files in .auto-claude directory contain http:// references for documentation purposes.

subtasks.title: Validate HTML structure
subtasks.description: Ensure all link tags are properly formed with valid attributes
subtasks.technical_details: Check that all anchor tags have proper href, target, rel, and class attributes
acceptance_criteria: All anchor tags are valid HTML
No syntax errors in updated links
subtasks.notes: HTML validation completed successfully. Verified that all 15 anchor tags are properly formed with valid attributes. All 13 external links use HTTPS protocol and have proper security attributes (target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer'). All href attributes are properly quoted with no syntax errors. HTML structure is valid and all tags are balanced.

final_acceptance: All HTTP links converted to HTTPS
All external links have rel='noopener noreferrer' attribute
All external links open in new tab with target='_blank'
All links remain accessible and functional

issues_found.description: None - All acceptance criteria passed. 8 HTTP links converted to HTTPS, 13/13 external links have proper security attributes, HTML valid, no regressions.
